item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: johnfraskos
item.content:encoded:
Neve Charity

Help others by giving

Every person whose life is improved or saved, stems from an act of generosity that’s purely voluntary. That’s why donating is so extraordinary when you do it.

Get involved in our causes About

more about us

Our Programs

Neve Charity programs provide support in some of the poorest and most underprivileged regions.

About Us

For over years, Neve Charity has been working to abolish poverty and illiteracy from all people.

Get Involved

Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good, you make a real difference.

Get involved where it matters

Connect with us and make a real difference to the life of those in need.

Get Involved

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good.

Learn more about our causes

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good.

Get Involved Our motto

Hope is everything

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good, you make a real and lasting difference in people’s lives.

Start now

Get Involved

item.title: old - neve-charity
item.dc:creator: johnfraskos
item.content:encoded:
Help others by giving

Every person whose life is improved or saved, stems from an act of generosity that's purely voluntary. That's why donating is so extraordinary when you do it.

Get Involved

Our Programs

Neve Charity programs provide support in some of the poorest and most underprivileged regions, creating opportunity for those in need to learn and thrive.

About Us

For over years, Neve Charity has been working to abolish how poverty and illiteracy so that all people have access to a quality life and strive for better life conditions.

Get Involved

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good, you make a real and lasting difference in people’s lives.

Discover all the ways
you can help give

Make a donation Start a fund Join the efforts

So far we've helped...

Countries People € 1200 Raised

Neve Charity's Stories

Life living in a poverty camp
You can live without money
Providing water in dry areas

Join our email list

Stay up to date on global charitable giving news & trends, read stories of philanthropy, and learn how the philanthropic landscape is changing.

Sign up

item.title: Neve charity homepage
item.dc:creator: johnfraskos
item.content:encoded:
Neve Charity

Help others by giving

Every person whose life is improved or saved, stems from an act of generosity that’s purely voluntary. That’s why donating is so extraordinary when you do it.

Get involved in our causes About

more about us

Our Programs

Neve Charity programs provide support in some of the poorest and most underprivileged regions.

About Us

For over years, Neve Charity has been working to abolish poverty and illiteracy from all people.

Get Involved

Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good, you make a real and lasting difference.

Get involved where it matters

Connect with us and make a real difference to the life of those in need.

Get Involved

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good.

Learn more about our causes

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good.
